revised_title: John Stanley Gardiner's Contributions to Zoology and Coral Reef Studies
tldr: John Stanley Gardiner was a notable zoologist who specialized in coral reef studies. He conducted expeditions to Funafuti Island, Laccadive and Maldivian Islands, and contributed significantly to the understanding of coral reef formation and the role of coral feeders in reef disintegration. His work also included collecting ethnological specimens from the islands he visited.
